explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of deep learning models for financial time series prediction, which is a subset of machine learning.
explanations.deep learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of deep learning models such as CNNs and LSTMs for financial time series prediction.
explanations.neural network: The proposed CLT model is a neural network architecture combining CNN, LSTM, and transformer components.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The paper uses a one-dimensional CNN network as part of the proposed CLT model for processing feature-based information.
explanations.CNN: Abbreviation for convolutional neural network, which is used in the proposed model.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper uses LSTM networks for processing temporal information in financial time series data.
explanations.LSTM: Abbreviation for long short-term memory, which is a key component of the proposed model.
explanations.representation learning: The model aims to identify latent patterns within financial data, which involves learning representations of the data.
explanations.attention mechanism: The transformer architecture used in the model incorporates attention mechanisms for processing information.
